scripts.server:dev: if [ -f server/package.json ]; then nodemon --config nodemon.server.json; else echo "Server dev script not configured"; fi
scripts.server:build: if [ -f server/package.json ]; then npm run build --prefix server; else echo "Server build script not configured"; fi
scripts.server:test: if [ -f server/package.json ]; then npm test --prefix server; else echo "Server tests not configured"; fi
scripts.server:lint: if [ -f server/package.json ]; then npm run lint --prefix server; else echo "Server lint skipped"; fi
scripts.server:lint:fix: if [ -f server/package.json ]; then npm run lint --prefix server -- --fix; else echo "Server lint skipped"; fi
scripts.lint: npm run app:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run app:lint:fix && npm run server:lint:fix
